ovdesc.p: This Table allows to define description for any application which is used during AA Product design phase where the record key is dated, like, AA.PRODUCT.DESIGNER. When defined for the record key (without date part), for all the variations with date, the same description would be taken by the system

desc.p: Description for the record key, Product Builder uses the description for all variations of the record
Describes the Id of the Table, in the format, Application * RecordKey
A more detailed description for the record key
